trans-unit.source: Provides common methods and properties for composite activity designers that contain structured layouts.
trans-unit.target: 包含结构化的布局的复合活动设计器提供通用方法和属性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner is the base class for all designers that contain child designers and the child designers are connected to each other using lines rendered on the design surface, called connectors.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner 是包含子设计器的所有设计器的基类和子设计器使用设计图面，调用连接器上呈现的线相互连接。

trans-unit.source: The class is provided so that activity designer developers can provide a number of activity designer layout types, rather than being tied to the layout provided in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: 类提供，允许活动设计器开发人员可以提供大量的活动设计器布局类型，而不是绑定到<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>类</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.CompositeActivityDesigner>中提供的布局

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current designer view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> ，包含有关当前设计器视图显示信息<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ActiveView contains the view ID and any text, images, activity designers, and user data associated with the view.
trans-unit.target: ActiveView 包含视图 ID 任何文本、 图像、 活动设计器和与视图关联的用户数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that contains information about the current view displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref> ，包含有关通过显示的当前视图信息<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以将指定的活动添加到<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>工作流设计图面上指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the screen location at which to attempt to insert the activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref>包含试图插入活动的屏幕位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>包含要添加的活动的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be inserted at the specified location on the workflow design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以在工作流设计图面; 上的指定位置插入指定的活动否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activities can be removed from the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以从中移除指定的活动<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to remove.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>包含要移除的活动的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified activities can be removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以移除指定的活动;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a generic read-only collection that contains all activity designers that are children of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含的子级的所有活动设计器的泛型只读集合<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the child designers.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>包含子设计器的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置受<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.GetDropTargets*>返回的放置目标数组中当前放置目标的索引

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示设计器的当前放置目标的索引。

trans-unit.source: Draws all of the connectors to display on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 绘制所有上显示的连接器<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 连接器是工作流设计图面上独立的设计器之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on the designers it connects.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接显示为设计图面上的行，每个行的端点连接到它所连接的设计器上的可见点。

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: 这些点称为连接点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> on which to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>在其上绘制连接器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"></xref> to draw the connectors.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Pen"> </xref>绘制连接器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> array that contains the endpoints for each of the connectors to draw.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>数组，其中包含要绘制的连接器的每个终结点。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector start points.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> ，确定要在连接器的起始点绘制的图形。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"></xref> that determines the graphic to draw at connector end points.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LineAnchor"> </xref> ，它确定要在连接器的终点绘制的图形。

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 请确保指定的活动设计器工作流设计图面上可见。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>为其确保工作流设计图面上的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: FirstSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A> property that is exposed through <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.
trans-unit.target: FirstSelectableObject 返回<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>与<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A>属性，则通过<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.ActiveView%2A>公开</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView.AssociatedDesigner%2A>相关联</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是设计器导航顺序中的第一个可选择对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
trans-unit.target: 在返回的有效放置位置的数组<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> to query the design surface with.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>查询设计图面上的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的有效放置位置的数组<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>面。

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection of points that represent the inner connection points for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示的内部连接点的点的只读集合<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Connectors are links between separate designers on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 连接器是工作流设计图面上独立的设计器之间的链接。

trans-unit.source: These links appear as lines on the design surface and each line end connects to a visible point on each designer it connects.
trans-unit.target: 这些链接显示为设计图面上的行，每个行的端点连接到它连接每个设计器上的可见点。

trans-unit.source: These points are called connection points.
trans-unit.target: 这些点称为连接点。

trans-unit.source: Designer classes that inherit from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> class can contain other designers, and GetInnerConnections returns a read-only collection of all the connection points for the designers associated with `edges` that are contained by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: 设计器类继承自<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>类可以包含其他设计器，并 GetInnerConnections 返回与关联的设计器的只读集合的所有连接点`edges`包含受支持<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The DesignerEdges along which to search for connection points.
trans-unit.target: 沿其搜索连接点 DesignerEdges。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> generic read-only collection that contains the inner connection points for the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref>包含设计器的内部连接点的泛型只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order for the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的导航顺序中位于指定的对象后面的第一个可选择对象<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 导航顺序中的当前对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> that determines the navigation order of the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> ，它确定设计器的导航顺序。

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follows the obj parameter in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: 第一个可选择后面 obj 的导航顺序中的参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer by using the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用指定的活动初始化设计器。

trans-unit.source: Initialize ensures that the active view loaded into the workflow design surface is a valid view.
trans-unit.target: 初始化可确保当前视图加载到工作流设计图面是有效的视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> with which to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>用来初始化<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified activities to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> at the specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 指定将活动添加到<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>工作流设计图面上指定的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that specifies the location to add the activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> ，它指定要添加活动的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection that contains the activities to add to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>只读集合，其中包含要添加到的活动<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> is the active activity designer, LastSelectableObject returns `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>是活动的活动设计器中，LastSelectableObject 返回`null`(`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If a child activity designer is the active designer, it returns the last selectable object associated with the active child designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果子活动设计器是有效的设计器，则返回与活动子窗体设计器关联的最后一个可选择对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>，它是设计器导航顺序中的最后一个可选择对象。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 加载的视图状态<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>从二进制流。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>用于还原设计器视图状态。</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: reader包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minimum size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取的最小大小设置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the smallest possible size for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示的可能的最小大小<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Moves the specified activities from one designer displayed in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to another.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的活动移动从一个设计器中显示<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>到另一个。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains the location on the workflow design surface to move the activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> ，其中包含要移动活动工作流设计图面上的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> read-only collection to move.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>要移动的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the activity associated with it changes.
trans-unit.target: 通知时与之关联的活动设计器更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the changed activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityChangedEventArgs"> </xref> ，包含有关已更改活动信息。

trans-unit.source: e is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e为空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when more than one of the activities it contains has changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>当多个它包含的活动已更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains information about the activities that changed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> ，包含有关已更改活动的信息。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is completed with the bounds of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>其设计图面的边界完成拖放操作时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref>定义操作事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>拖放操作正在进行并且用户的鼠标光标进入设计器的边界时。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref>定义操作事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor leaves the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>拖放操作正在进行并且用户的鼠标光标离开设计器的边界时。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>时正在执行拖放操作并且用户的鼠标光标位于设计器边界内。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that defines the operation event arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref>定义操作事件自变量。

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 执行位置视觉提示和子设计器上布局任务<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含布局自变量。

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: e包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the size of the visual cues on the designers displayed by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> have changed.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>显示的设计器上的视觉提示大小<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>已更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the layout arguments.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref>包含布局自变量。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the new size of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>表示的新大小<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>工作流设计图面上。

trans-unit.source: Displays the designer verbs associated with a smart tag at a specified location on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 显示与工作流设计图面上的指定位置处的智能标记关联的设计器谓词。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the location on the workflow design surface for which to show <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> ，它表示要显示的工作流设计图面上的位置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> when the current designer view changes.
trans-unit.target: 通知<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>当当前设计器查看更改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref>要设置。

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: 将存储的当前视图状态<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>到二进制流。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>到存储的当前设计器视图状态。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> displays smart tags.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>显示智能标记。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the designer displays smart tags; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果设计器显示智能标记;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of designer actions that are associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: 获取与设计器上的智能标记关联的设计器操作的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection is returned only if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner> hosts multiple views.
trans-unit.target: 仅当返回的集合<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>承载多个视图。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A> property to determine how many views the current designer hosts.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A>属性来确定多少个视图当前设计器宿主。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner.Views%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"></xref> read-only collection that contains all the actions associated with the smart tags on the designer.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerAction"> </xref>包含与设计器上的智能标记关联的所有操作的只读集合。

trans-unit.source: Get a read-only collection of designer views that the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref> hosts.
trans-unit.target: 获取设计器视图的只读集合的当前<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>主机。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"></xref> read-only collection that contains the views hosted by the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerView"> </xref>包含由当前承载的视图的只读集合<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner"> </xref>。
